00032 
00033 #include <sys/heap.h>
00034 
00035 #ifndef LIB_HEAPSIZE
00036 #define LIB_HEAPSIZE     16384
00037 #endif
00038 
00039 static char *lib_heap_ptr;
00040 static long lib_heap_size = LIB_HEAPSIZE;
00041 
00049 char *_sbrk(size_t len)
00050 {
00051     char *rc = (char *)-1;
00052 
00053     if (lib_heap_ptr == NULL) {
00054         lib_heap_ptr = NutHeapAlloc(lib_heap_size);
00055     }
00056     if (lib_heap_ptr && len <= lib_heap_size) {
00057         rc = lib_heap_ptr;
00058         lib_heap_ptr += len;
00059         lib_heap_size -= len;
00060     }
00061     return rc;
00062 }
